boardgame.name: German Railways
Preußische Ostbahn
boardgame.description: Preu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;szlig;ische Ostbahn is the second game in Winsome's Historic Railroads System and was initially released at Essen 2008 and was reprinted in January 2010. Queen Games' German Railways is the first game in their Iron Horse collection._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Harry Wu's Preu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;szlig;ische Ostbahn builds upon the system established in Chicago Express, and takes the game series to Germany, 1840-1870. Preu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;szlig;ische Ostbahn (Prussian Eastern Railroad in English) introduces an innovative new Player Order mechanism to the system._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; In addition, each Railroad now has a special characteristic, based upon its history:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Preu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;szlig;ische Ostbahn - May build up to 4 track; 20 black track; K_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ouml;nigsberg start._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Niederschlesische - No City Penalty; 17 brown track; Breslau start._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;auml;chsische - May build up to 2 track; 11 orange track; Leipzig start._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Bayerische - Track cost -1 per hex; 16 blue track; M_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml;nchen start._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Main-Weser - Double one City Income; 14 yellow track; Kassel start._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Badische - One free rural track/build; 15 red track; Mannheim start._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; K_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ouml;ln-Mindener - $5 maximum expediture/build; 12 purple track; Essen start._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Berlin-Hamburger - Must connect both to receive Dividends; 13 green track; Wittenberge start._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Preu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;szlig;ische Ostbahn is a German Family Game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
